scripts.zip: node -e "if(require('fs').existsSync('dist')){const archiver=require('archiver');const output=require('fs').createWriteStream('deployment.zip');const archive=archiver('zip');output.on('close',()=>console.log('Created dist.zip'));archive.pipe(output);archive.directory('dist/',false);archive.directory('node_modules/','node_modules');archive.finalize()}else{console.error('dist directory does not exist');process.exit(1)}"
